definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: The last byte illuminates and latches all odd-numbered LEDs.
sentences.chinese: 最後一個字節點亮並鎖存所有奇數LED。

sentences.english: Given a positive odd number n, the output magic squares of order n.
sentences.chinese: 給定一個正奇數n，輸出n階幻方。

sentences.english: The Chinese people stress tosend gifts in pairs, for odd numbers are regarded as inauspicious。
sentences.chinese: 中國人一般講究禮品成雙，因爲奇數被視爲不吉利。

sentences.english: With an odd number of cuts, things start to get more complicated.
sentences.chinese: 要是刀數爲奇數，題目變得越發龐年夜。

sentences.english: Some states and local jurisdictions hold elections in odd-numbered years.
sentences.chinese: 還有一些州和地方政府在奇數年份舉行選舉。

sentences.english: North - south interstate are odd-numbered and increase from west to east.
sentences.chinese: 南北向的州際高速公路用奇數，數字由西向東遞增。

sentences.english: In China, the down trains are given odd numbers.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，下行列車編號用奇數。

sentences.english: Using only an even number of eyelet pairs avoids the odd limitation.
sentences.chinese: 只用一個甚至若干孔對避免奇數的限制。

sentences.english: The master device may only start transmitting on an even numbered slot.
sentences.chinese: 主設備只能在奇數時隙上開始傳輸。

sentences.english: Because it's now solving a one-smaller problem.
sentences.chinese: 在上一步是奇數的基礎上。

sentences.english: Is it an even number or an odd number?
This only works for flags with an odd number of rows.
sentences.chinese: 這種模式只適用於行數爲奇數的星條旗。

sentences.english: The logic is, of course, reversed for odd-numbered hdisks.
sentences.chinese: 當然，對於奇數編號的硬盤，採用相反的規則。

definition: see 八風穴|八风穴[ba1 feng1 xue2]
leap year/(lunar calendar) year with a thirteen intercalary month
basis point (finance), abbr. to 基點|基点[ji1 dian3]
